price: 48. Ese día serán arrastrados hacia el fuego boca abajo (y se les dirá:) “Sufran el dolor del fuego del Infierno”.
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُسۡحَبُونَ فِي ٱلنَّارِ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمۡ ذُوقُواْ مَسَّ سَقَرَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: yawma yus'ḥabūna fī al-nāri ʿalā wujūhihim dhūqū massa saqara
